trends: There have been 2 other sightings in DuBois
There were no other sightings in DuBois on or around July 22nd 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsOn Sun morning July 22,2012,Myself and 3 Other witness observed an orangish,reddish white ball of light in the sky.We observed this object from 12.25 am-12.59 am.the object was observed at about 70 degrees above the horizon to eventually about 30D above the horizon before eventually vanishing and reapearing about 80d above horizon and farther away.The object did the following moves while being observed.left to right motions zig zag motions ,circle motions and even what appeared to be a figure 8 motion.toal time object was being observed was approximately 35 min.
Summary: already spoke with Freg Saluga about incident.
